feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow skipping migration redirects by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16434
  • Improve migration ux by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16441
  • Check for /embed url when matching workspace apps for routing by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16449

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.5...3.13.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade to dd-trace 5.56.0 by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16450
  • Prune majority of phosphor icons and serve required files as static assets by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16455
  • Make apps list context menus visible again. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16457
  • Support for viewing Automation logs with branches. by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16445
  • Fix automation error link by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16469
  • Filter down to primary key options by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16470
  • Correctly add new columns to design section tables by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16442
  • Fix for Make connector where body wasn't being parsed correctly by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16472
  • Add Claude Code GitHub Workflow by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16359
  • "On input" actions by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16473
  • Fixes for Automation UI by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16465
  • Typing multiselect field component in client by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16479

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.6...3.13.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Fix] Autogenerate screens from data by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16484

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.7...3.13.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change email endpoint for account holder tenant users by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16485
  • Add ability to duplicate automation step by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16412
  • Fix disappearing dev app by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16487
  • Make azure OpenAI config more clear by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16488
  • Prevents columns in Data section from being hidden on base-tables by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16414
  • New font by @joebudi in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16407
  • Allow Postgres enums to be searched by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16492
  • Testing groups correctly handle apps that don't exist by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16491
  • Revert "Add Claude Code GitHub Workflow" by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16489
  • [BUDI-9478] Fix exporting and importing a CSV to the same table. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16493
  • [BUDI-9240] Propagate OAuth2 information to external data connector and API Request automation steps by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16482
  • Allow S3 file uploads from public screens by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16503
  • Fix for budi backups tool on WSL by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16498
  • CI check for client library size by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16502
  • Fix for embed issues in safari by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16474
  • 16011 expand export to csv app action functionality for users by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16486
  • Fixing user page render when invites present by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16510
  • [BUDI-9221] Add a new button to duplicate internal tables without their data. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16478
  • fixes styling issue on disabled menu items by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16505
  • Fix updatedby relationship type direction by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.8...3.13.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BUDI-9364] Give sorting in views better labels based on field type. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16521
  • Make processDates more resilient to invalid dates, and improve error reporting. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16522

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.9...3.13.10
